org.mini2Dx.core.audio

Interface Music

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.mini2Dx.gdx.utils.Disposable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AndroidMini2DxMusic, LibgdxMusic

    public interface Music
extends org.mini2Dx.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Base interface for Music stream-based playback

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getId()
      Returns the unique ID for this instance
      float getPosition()
      Returns the playback position
      float getVolume()
      Returns the volume of the music
      boolean isLooping()
      Returns if the music will loop
      boolean isPlaying()
      Returns if the music is playing
      void pause()
      Pauses the playback if it is currently playing
      void play()
      Starts playing the music stream.
      void setLooping(boolean isLooping)
      Sets if the music should loop.
      void setVolume(float volume)
      Sets the volume of the music
      void stop()
      Stops the playback if it is paused or currently playing.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.mini2Dx.gdx.utils.Disposable

        dispose

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        long getId()
        Returns the unique ID for this instance
        Returns:
        The unique ID

      • play

        void play()
        Starts playing the music stream. If the stream was paused, it will resume playing. If the stream was finished or stopped, it will restart.

      • pause

        void pause()
        Pauses the playback if it is currently playing

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stops the playback if it is paused or currently playing. The next call to play() will start playback from the beginning.

      • isPlaying

        boolean isPlaying()
        Returns if the music is playing
        Returns:
        True if playing

      • setLooping

        void setLooping(boolean isLooping)
        Sets if the music should loop. Can be called anytime.
        Parameters:
        isLooping - True if the music should loop.

      • isLooping

        boolean isLooping()
        Returns if the music will loop
        Returns:
        True if looping

      • setVolume

        void setVolume(float volume)
        Sets the volume of the music
        Parameters:
        volume - A value between 0.0 and 1.0 where 0.0 is silent and 1.0 is maximum volume.

      • getVolume

        float getVolume()
        Returns the volume of the music
        Returns:
        A value between 0.0 and 1.0 where 0.0 is silent and 1.0 is maximum volume.

      • getPosition

        float getPosition()
        Returns the playback position
        Returns:
        The position in seconds
